name: Road Trip Planner File
summary: Learn about .ROADTRIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The file can be shared and used by different Road Trip Planner users.

description: A ROADTRIP file is a data file created by Road Trip Planner, an macOS and iOS application that enables users to plan road trips. It contains a map with various information such as location pins, trip itineraries, and trip details.
